meanings.definition: The act of looking at something.
meanings.sent1: During the viewings at the art gallery, people admired the paintings.
meanings.sent2: The viewings of the beautiful sunset brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The viewings of the funny cat videos made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her viewings of life through a positive lens inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The viewings of the majestic mountains took their breath away.

meanings.definition: The number of people watching a television program or movie.
meanings.sent1: The viewings of the popular show reached record numbers.
meanings.sent2: The viewings for the movie premiere were sold out.
meanings.sent3: The viewings of the comedy series had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: His viewings of the thriller movie kept him on the edge of his seat.
meanings.sent5: The viewings of the live concert were filled with excitement.

meanings.definition: The display of a property to potential buyers.
meanings.sent1: The viewings of the house attracted many interested buyers.
meanings.sent2: The viewings of the apartment showcased its modern design.
meanings.sent3: The viewings of the mansion made everyone dream big.
meanings.sent4: Her viewings of the cozy cottage made her want to move in.
meanings.sent5: The viewings of the beachfront property left a lasting impression.
